sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import './checkout-summary.styles.scss' import {selectCartSubtotal, selectCartTotal, selectCartTaxes, selectShippingTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' const CheckoutSummary = ({total, subtotal, taxes, shipping}) => { return (

Summary

Subtotal ${subtotal}
Estimated Delivery & Handling ${shipping}
Taxes ${taxes}
Total ${total}
{/*
*Please use the following test credit card for payments*

4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 10/20 - CVV: 123
*/}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ subtotal: selectCartSubtotal, total: selectCartTotal, taxes: selectCartTaxes, shipping: selectShippingTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutSummary)
